NewText_06:
This threat is also an opportunity! Fight
well, and we can wipe them out in one
battle, hives and all!
NewText_07:
<snd:WeaponSwingM_00>Prepare yourselves for battle! Let's show
them the true power of the Gerudo!
NewText_01:
I'm curious about that voice we heard
earlier, but...
NewText_10:
<snd:SurpriseL_01>Situation report! Large numbers of Gibdos
are moving to attack the town!
NewText_09: Protect our chief! Protect our town!
NewText_03:
Before anything else, we'll need to deal
with this.
